Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The biggest difference of the way impacting my learning between GenAI and my teacher is that teacher can interact with me at a deep level by face to face communication and observation while AI just gives answers based on my proactive questions.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I often felt that GenAI can't understand what I truly want to know and just offer me some general answers.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: One thing that AI cannot replace teacher is the humanity.
